### Why:

The current account and profile documentation frontmatter and intro text were a bit wordy and could be clearer. Improving these will help users understand the purpose of the page quickly and improve the maintainability of the YAML frontmatter for future edits.

### What's being changed (if available, include any code snippets, screenshots, or gifs):

- Reworded the intro to use more concise and natural language:
  - Changed "adjusting the settings" to "customizing your personal account settings"
  - Changed "managing the notifications you receive" to "managing your notification preferences"
- Converted the intro string from single-quoted to multi-line YAML format for easier readability and editing.
- Cleaned up YAML formatting and indentation for better consistency.
- No visual UI changes; documentation metadata improvements only.
